scripts.client:start:development: npm run client:env:development && NODE_ENV=development && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start dotenv_config_path=$PWD/.env
scripts.client:start:staging: npm run client:env:staging && NODE_ENV=staging && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start dotenv_config_path=$PWD/.env
scripts.client:start:production: npm run client:env:production && NODE_ENV=production && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start dotenv_config_path=$PWD/.env
scripts.client:build:development: npm run client:env:development && NODE_ENV=development && react-scripts --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=8192 build && npm run build:version
scripts.client:build:staging: npm run client:env:staging && NODE_ENV=staging && react-scripts --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=8192 build && npm run build:version
scripts.client:build:production: npm run client:env:production && NODE_ENV=production && react-scripts --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=8192 build && npm run build:version
scripts.build:version: npm run build:version:id && npm run build:version:date && npm run build:author
scripts.build:author: BUILD_AUTHOR=$(git config --global user.email) && sed -i -- 's/%BUILD_AUTHOR%/'$BUILD_AUTHOR'/g' ./build/index.html
